description:
Hakuya is concerned about White Day. Mashiro takes him to task. Benio swoons. Kobeni is mai waifu. The lovey-dovey deepens. Kobeni is a good girl. Konoha is also a good girl. Niko is a good girl, but she`s also on the rampage.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Dereki to Iu Tango o Shirabetara
I Looked Up the Term "Time of Dere"
デレ期という単語を調べたら
